## Core Rules These are the general rules of RMC14. Click them for more information. - [textlink="1. This is a English server, please only use English." link="RMCLanguage"] - [textlink="2. Do not use multiple accounts, or alt accounts." link="RMCMultikey"] - [textlink="3. Follow the rules of escalation against non-hostiles." link="RMCRulesEscalation"] - [textlink="4. Don't use information gained from outside your character's knowledge." link="RMCMetaknowledge"] - [textlink="5. Don't antagonize or harass players." link="RMCKindness"] - [textlink="7. Mutinies, riots and similar activity require admin permission." link="RMCMutinies"] - 8. Don't quit if you do not get the role/kit/squad you want, be considerate. - 9. Follow the roleplay rules and standards of the server. (Outlined at the bottom of this page)
8. (Additional notes) By opting for certain roles, you are opting into the possibility of supporting any given squad, regardless of personal preference. You are directly affecting the gameplay of others by quitting. Please do not opt into roles you do not feel comfortable playing, so they remain open and obtainable by other players at the start of the round.
